clues.text: Auxin is a growth type of this substance; it regulates plant growth, especially in stems

Of 10, 21 or 25, the number of merit badges a scout needs to qualify for the rank of Eagle Scout

The nickname of Detective Eagan, who inspired "The French Connection", & of Detective Doyle in the film
